definitions.title: vb. Niph.
definitions.body: be separated, distinct (‖ form of [[פלא]] q. v.; cf. Ar. flw, fala0’a separate from sucking, wean; Eth. falaya: separate, distinguish);—
Pf. 1 pl. consec. [[וְנִפְלִינוּ]] Ex 33:16 and we shall be distinct, c. [[מִן]] pers.
1 s. [[נִפְלֵיתִי]] Ps 139:14 I am wonderful (viz. in bodily stature etc.); < VrssHupNow Bae We [[תָ]]- thou [´[[י]]] art wonderful ([[פלא]]

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הִפְלָה]] Ps 4:4, ´[[וְה]] consec. Ex 9:4; 1 s. [[וְהִפְלֵיתִי]] consec. Ex 8:18; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַפְלֶה]] Ex 11:7; Imv. ms. [[הַפְלֵה]] Ps 17:7; —of ´[[י]], make separate, c. acc. Ex 8:18 (by treating differently); set apart Ps 4:4, but perh. read [[חֶסֶד לִי]] (for Mt [[חָסִיד לוֹ]]), hath made wonderful (his) kindness to me (Dy Gr Che We Du [Bae ‘ perh. ’]), so Ps 17:7 (cf. Ps 31:22); distinguish between, [[בֵּין]] rei, Ex 9:4, [[בֵּין]] pers. Ex 11:7.
